Title: Hulk Versus the World
Director: Sebastian Montes, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Kevin Burke, Chris Wyatt, Christopher Yost (story), Joshua Fine (story)
Actors: Gabriel Mann, Keith Ferguson, Vanessa Marshall, Rick D. Wasserman
Plot: The Hulk is hunted by General Ross and the Absorbing Man while Hawkeye discover a conspiracy within SHIELD.
